testInfo.name: Тест по Past Perfect Continuous
testInfo.description: Тест на прошедшее совершенное продолженное время

questions.question: Choose the correct form: She ___ for two hours when I arrived.
What is the structure of Past Perfect Continuous?
Fill in the blank: They ___ (wait) for over an hour when the bus finally came.
When do we use Past Perfect Continuous?
options: For actions continuing up to a point in the past
questions.correctAnswer: For actions continuing up to a point in the past

questions.question: Fill in the blank: How long ___ you ___ (work) there before you quit?
Which sentence emphasizes duration before another past action?
options: I had worked there for 5 years.
I had been working there for 5 years when I got promoted.
I was working there for 5 years.
questions.correctAnswer: I had been working there for 5 years when I got promoted.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: His eyes were red because he ___ (cry).
What is the question form for 'they had been working'?
Fill in the blank: She was tired because she ___ (study) all night.
Choose the correct sentence:
options: It had been raining for hours when we decided to cancel.
It had rained for hours when we decided to cancel.
It was raining for hours when we decided to cancel.
It rained for hours when we decided to cancel.
questions.correctAnswer: It had been raining for hours when we decided to cancel.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: We ___ (live) in that house for ten years before we moved.
Which emphasizes cause and result in the past?
Fill in the blank: The ground was wet. It ___ (rain).
What is the negative form of 'I had been waiting'?
Fill in the blank: They ___ (travel) for months before they found a place to stay.
